meanings.definition: An intaglio printing process in which an image is engraved onto a plate.
meanings.sent1: The artist created a beautiful gravure of a flower on the metal plate.
meanings.sent2: I bought a gravure of a famous painting to hang in my living room.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat accidentally stepped on the gravure plate, leaving tiny paw prints.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like a gravure etched deeply into her mind.
meanings.sent5: The gravure of the mountain scene was so detailed, it felt like I could step into it.

meanings.definition: A print made using the gravure process.
meanings.sent1: The magazine cover featured a stunning gravure of a model.
meanings.sent2: I framed the gravure of the city skyline and hung it in my office.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the stack of gravure prints, creating a mess.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a gravure, leaving a lasting impression on everyone who heard them.
meanings.sent5: The gravure of the sunset captured the colors so vividly, it felt like watching it in real life.
